Generation VIII.Sword: The moment it evolved, it took on a complex flavor. This is because of the way its cells spontaneously shifted during evolution.
Generation VIII.Shield: The cells that compose its cream fluctuated suddenly during evolution, giving the cream a complex flavor.

Generation IX.Scarlet: Slight vibrations shook its cells when it evolved, giving it a complex flavor.
Generation IX.Violet: When attacked, it strikes back by throwing cream accented with complex flavors.
